product_summary: Steno.ai is an AI-powered transcription and note-taking tool that makes it easy to capture, organize, and share your ideas. With its advanced speech recognition technology, Steno.ai can transcribe audio in real-time with high accuracy, allowing you to focus on your thoughts and ideas rather than taking notes manually.
product_pros: Automatic organization and tagging of notes
Collaboration features for easy sharing and editing
product_cons: May not be suitable for transcribing complex or technical audio
Requires an internet connection for real-time transcription
Can be slow to process large audio files
Limited customization options for transcription settings
May not be able to capture all nuances of speech

product_usecases.details: Steno.ai can be used to transcribe meetings, capturing key points and action items for easy reference and follow-up.
Students can use Steno.ai to take notes during lectures, allowing them to focus on listening and understanding rather than writing.
Reporters and interviewers can use Steno.ai to transcribe interviews quickly and accurately, saving time and effort.
Podcasters can use Steno.ai to transcribe their audio recordings, making them accessible to a wider audience.
Researchers and analysts can use Steno.ai to transcribe audio and video recordings of interviews, focus groups, and other sources, making it easier to analyze and identify key insights.

product_toolfor.details: Steno.ai can help students take notes more efficiently, improve their understanding of lectures, and prepare for exams.
Professionals can use Steno.ai to transcribe meetings, interviews, and other important conversations, saving time and ensuring accuracy.
Journalists can use Steno.ai to quickly and accurately transcribe interviews and other audio recordings, allowing them to focus on writing their stories.
Researchers can use Steno.ai to transcribe audio and video recordings of interviews, focus groups, and other sources, making it easier to analyze and identify key insights.
Content creators can use Steno.ai to transcribe their podcasts, videos, and other audio content, making it more accessible to their audience.

product_pricing: Steno.ai offers a free plan with limited features, as well as paid plans starting at $12 per month. The paid plans offer additional features such as unlimited transcription time, advanced editing tools, and integrations with popular productivity tools.
